#-----main-----

#input
S = input()
T = input()

#initialize
count = 0

#count the number of differences
for i in range(len(S)):
    if S[i] != T[i]:
        count += 1

#output
print(count)

s = input()
t = input()

count = 0

for i in range(len(s)):
    if s[i] != t[i]:
        count += 1

print(count)
